StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDailyApptIntv]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TargetDate date.me, @Organiza.onId int, @RecruiterId uniqueidentifier = null
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT pe.LastName + ', ' + pe.FirstName AS FullName, e.StartDate, p.Source, p.Ac.vity, p.ProspectID, e.Loca.on, ph1.PhoneNumber AS HomePhone, ph2.PhoneNumber AS CellPhone, a.Type AS ApptOutcome, i.Type AS IntvOutcome, CASE WHEN e.EventTypeId = 187 THEN '*' ELSE '' END AS EventTypePos.ix FROM USMC.Event e INNER JOIN USMC.EventSubject s ON s.EventID = e.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.AppointmentOutcome a ON a.ID = oc.AppointmentOutcomeId LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.InterviewOutcome i on i.ID = oc.InterviewOutcomeId LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.Subjec.d = p.ProspectId LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person pe ON p.PersonId = pe.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone ph1 ON p.PersonId = ph1.PersonId AND ph1.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone ph2 ON p.PersonId = ph2.PersonId AND ph2.PersonPhoneTypeId = 3 WHERE EventSourceId = 16 AND EventTypeId IN (85, 187) AND EventPrecision = 1 AND ( ( YEAR(e.StartDate) = YEAR(@TargetDate) AND MONTH(e.StartDate) = MONTH(@TargetDate) AND DAY(e.StartDate) = DAY(@TargetDate) ) OR ( YEAR(e.EndDate) = YEAR(@TargetDate) AND MONTH(e.EndDate) = MONTH(@TargetDate) AND DAY(e.EndDate) = DAY(@TargetDate) ) ) AND e.Organiza.onId = @Organiza.onId AND ( @RecruiterId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT ID FROM USMC.EventOwners eo WHERE eo.EventId = e.ID AND eo.OwnerID= @RecruiterId ) ) ORDER BY e.StartDate, pe.LastName, pe.FirstName END
